heading: HB08413
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN "ADOPT-A-LIBRARY" PROGRAM, PROVIDING INCENTIVES THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2018-10-10
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08413
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN "ADOPT-A-LIBRARY" PROGRAM, PROVIDING INCENTIVES THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to recognize the important role of the private sector in augmenting the government's efforts and resources in the construction and maintenance of libraries across the country. Proposes to allow the private sector to assist a local government unit, public elementary or secondary school, or State University or College (SUC) in establishing and maintaining libraries within their respective jurisdiction.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-09
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2019-01-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2018-10-10
